title: Validate artifacts only shows 12 of 16 artifacts

content.raw:
Worth noting that the tool does not show all the artifacts, only 12 of the 16 – it shows the first 4 each of phones, randys, and backpacks.

Is there some artificial cap written in there? 

Suppose this follows given the output:

```
[Dbg] [ArtifactValidator.cc:141] Scanning: 0 levels
[Dbg] [ArtifactValidator.cc:144] Have poses for: 12/28
```

Easy to reproduce with: 

```
ign launch -v 4 ~/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/launch/validate_artifacts.ign worldName:=urban_qual
ign service -s /artifact/scan --reqtype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --reptype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --timeout 1000 --req 'data: ""'
```

then iterate this:

```
ign service -s /artifact/next --reqtype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --reptype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --timeout 1000 --req 'data: ""' 
```

‌

Worth noting that the tool does not show all the artifacts, only 12 of the 16 – it shows the first 4 each of phones, randys, and backpacks.

Is there some artificial cap written in there?

Suppose this follows given the output:

[Dbg] [ArtifactValidator.cc:141] Scanning: 0 levels
[Dbg] [ArtifactValidator.cc:144] Have poses for: 12/28

Easy to reproduce with: 

ign launch -v 4 ~/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/launch/validate_artifacts.ign worldName:=urban_qual
ign service -s /artifact/scan --reqtype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --reptype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --timeout 1000 --req 'data: ""'

then iterate this:

ign service -s /artifact/next --reqtype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --reptype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --timeout 1000 --req 'data: ""'
